content: before turning and continue with 1 single_crochet along the borders until triangle border is complete -weave and tuck in all yarn strands and ends fasten_off leave a long tail to sew to the head sorry for the sewing 12 snout is white color embroider nose in pink color snout is an oval shape snout various nose designs chain 6 2nd chain from hook 1 half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet then 1 slip_stitch to other side in the same st 1 half_double_crochet 3 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet then 1 slip_stitch in the initial st fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew to the face center the snout one row below the eyes sorry for the sewing assemble -sew the ears on the top sides of the head -embroider a pink nose then sew the completed snout onto the face -sew the completed head on top of the body you may wish to angle the head so the face is tilted to the side or keep the head facing straight ahead make sure the head is placed on top of the body with the tail on top as well 13 other super helpful tutorials photos and videos many tutorials i have found helpful are from june gilbank or www planetjune com ● magic_ring www planetjune com/magicring ● invisible decrease www planetjune com/invdec this technique is a much cleaner look than just a regular decrease ● fasten_off www planetjune com/fastenoff ● finish for open edges such as leg 1 and the tail www planetjune com/invfinish ● closing the head www planetjune com/finish ● changing color www planetjune com/color ● blo flo www planetjune com/loops if you like this pattern please feel free to use cns10 at checkout anytime for future purchases 14
